text: Pompeio Arrigoni or Pompeo Arrigoni (1552–1616) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 24 Feb 1607, he was consecrated bishop Pope Paul V, with Ludovico de Torres, Archbishop of Monreale, with Marcello Lante della Rovere, Bishop of Todi, serving as co-consecrators. While bishop, he was the principal consecrator of Bartolomeo Giorgi, Bishop of Pesaro (1609); and Pietro Federici, Bishop of Vulturara e Montecorvino (1609). ==References== Category:1552 births Category:1616 deaths Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church)
title: Pompeio Arrigoni
